project.title: Talk
project.description: Talk is a mobile app focused on providing a secure and reliable platform for real-time communication. Users can send instant messages and connect globally with friends and family.
project.userBase: Anyone looking for a simple messaging solution

project.title: Tercardia SmartDoc
project.shortDescription: Doctor consultation app for physicians and patients.
project.description: Tercardia SmartDoc is a healthcare application designed to connect physicians and patients for remote consultations. The app integrates biometric security features and offers a seamless user experience for medical professionals and their patients.
project.userBase: Physicians and patients seeking remote healthcare solutions
